rationale: Currently only the query input has visible focus styles (focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-1). Widget buttons lack visible focus indicators, making keyboard navigation difficult as users cannot tell which element is currently focused.
problemSolved: Widget buttons use 'hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-600' for hover states but lack explicit focus ring styles. The Lock/Unlock, Reset Layout, Refresh, and severity filter buttons all lack visible focus indicators.
